Oddball, computer nerd, aspiring ecosystem co-creator, I've lead a strange and unlikely life. I dropped out of high school and was homeless for several years. During that time I learned Reiki, and how to operate and program Linux computers. I decided to get a job as a programmer, so I created a project and presented it at CodeCon 2004. That led to a career as a computer programmer. I'm now semi-retired and I've turned my attention to my other passion: gardening and ecology.

note: Author of Fantasy and Science Fiction novels, including the Chronicles of Xax series.

#Author. #Speaker. #Consultant. Mother. Wife. Goad. #Yankiwi..🇺🇸 🇳🇿#Futurist and #sci-fi gal about town. #sciencefiction #SFF #technology #ethics #humanism #cyborg #robot #AI #NewMythos #bookstagram #booktwitter #writer
MSNBC columnist, freelance journalist, Cancel Me, Daddy co-host. This is my real account, not the one that copied my Twitter bio

I'm an author of the Space Opera variety, nerding out about science and space.

@Jenthulhu on the bird site.

I like to talk about my hobbies: yarn, wool, spinning, weaving, knitting. Renaissance woman, mother of 2, maker of many things, handy to have around in the next zombie apocalypse. Keep me alive to survive.
